title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 382: Featuring Rick Tocchet
description:
On Episode 382 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Rick Tocchet. Toch joined to discuss his playing career, his coaching career, working with Biz on TNT and tons more. But first, the guys open the show discussing Easter weekend, Biz finding his inner zen, and Kyrie Iriving. The guys then dive into the Ryan Hartman Fine and discuss some potential playoff matchups. The guys wrap up the show discussing who is the best dressed team in the NHL, Tom Brady, and what Grinds RA's Gears.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
